sentences.en: Be mindful if you use the free parse functions.
sentences.cn: 紧记,如果你使用自由的parse函数.

sentences.en: Can you explain briefly the difference between soft and hard parse?
sentences.cn: 你能不能给我详细介绍一下软解析与硬解析的区别 啊 ?

sentences.en: Closure enabled non - terminals, by default, default - construct variables upon entering the parse member function.
sentences.cn: 默认的, 闭包允许 非 终结符在进入parse成员函数前初始化有默认构造函数的变量.

sentences.en: Closures provide named ( lazy ) variables associated with each parse rule invocation.
sentences.cn: 闭包提供了与每次规则调用相关联的命名 ( 惰性 ) 变量.

sentences.en: GDB could not parse a type specification output by the compiler.
sentences.cn: GDB不能分析编译器产生的某种类型的说明.

sentences.en: How do I parse, create, and manipulate internet formats?
sentences.cn: 怎样才能分析 、 创建和操作网络格式的文本?

sentences.en: How to parse polls, play the odds, and embrace uncertainty.
sentences.cn: 怎样剖析投票, 怎样碰碰运气, 以及怎样接受不确定性.

sentences.en: How would you parse it, then?
I simply could not parse what you just said.
sentences.cn: 我完全无法对你刚说的话作语法分析.

sentences.en: I simply couldn't parse what you just said.
sentences.cn: 我完全无法对你刚说的话作语法分析。

sentences.en: Let him construe the letter into English, and parse it over perfectly.
sentences.cn: 让他把信件逐字翻译成英文, 并且完美地对它作语法分析.

sentences.en: Now we are ready to parse the request into its constituent items.
sentences.cn: 现在我们可以准备开始编译请求了.

sentences.en: The Directory Service cannot parse the script because of a syntax error.
sentences.cn: 由于语法错误,目录服务无法分解此脚本.

sentences.en: The rule Parse - Vp will now trigger.
The rule Parse - Vp will now trigger.
Then you could have your test automation read, parse, and use the data in this file.
sentences.cn: 然后您可以让您的测试自动化读取、解析和使用该文件中的数据。

sentences.en: Then you go and parse hundreds of thousands of games.
sentences.cn: 接着你就可以用其来分析数以千计的对局了.

sentences.en: This method is intended for debugging only, as it lets me compare the result of a parse with expected results.
sentences.cn: 我只是打算在调试时使用这个方法，它可以让我用所期望的结果与解析的结果作比较。

words.tran_cn: [计] 分析程序；语法剖析程式

trans.tran_en: to describe the grammar of a word when it is in a particular sentence, or the grammar of the whole sentence

trans.tran_cn: 从语法上描述或分析（词句等）
